page.title: 06White Notley station (2)
page.content: the line is still operating and has grown. Today there are trains in both directions running from early morning until quite late at night at roughly hourly intervals. Most of the trains are eight carriage electric trains which link Braintree with Liverpool Street. If you are going to White Notley you have to choose your carriage carefully because the platform is only long enough for two carriages! The whole station is controlled by one man but two men are employed so that they work part of each day. Part of their job is to move the gates on the level crossing whenever a train is coming because when the line was electrified nearly ten years ago the level crossing was not changed.
